publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6001 Rhona Brankin: Fertility Postcode Lotteryâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the news that 12 out of 14 NHS boards are compliant with the national criteria for Level III Assisted Conception Treatment of 39 years inclusive; regrets that NHS Fife and Lothian have yet to comply, and calls on them to do so.
